name: Jupitron Game Collection Vol.2
description:
-"Multiplayer Garden is a collection of unreleased games that I've been testing and balacing on events and parties so there's fun in everyone of them."


Includes:

-Boilership (2014) - A Galaxian kind of game with trippy backgrounds and lots of enemies (can be played alone).

-HoldOn! (2014) - Defend the Sacred Stone from a MASSIVE horde of enemies (music made on a Korg Monotron).

-Super Ritual Bros Turbo (2014) - Made in less than 48 hours on the GlobalGameJam (Credits to Noid.exe, SoyPepenacho, LucasArgano).

-TurretStorm (2015) - Spaceship battles with a saw (there was an oni demon head but lost everything, hard drive broke, was cool though).

-Discopunk (2017) - Endless space dogfighting (Music made on BoscaCeoil2).

Xbox 360 controllers required for each game, grab a pal/girl you like and spend a cool saturday night shouting and cursing, practice to make babies. Send me the wedding invitation.
